attributes.action: Spread the Investment fairly among the whole network, and not just in the South Ease
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The South East gets the bulk of any railway investment. Commuters around Londer are getting longer and more frequent services where as commuters in and around Preston, Manchester, Leeds, Newcastle and other places have to cram themselves into short, infrequent services.

Also, in London alone, there is close to £30bn worth of new projexts being planned, but the rest of the country has do put up with "make do and mend" repairs.

I'm asking the government to direct Network Rail and the DfT to spread the investments more fairly to benefit more passengers
